numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Most players in every sport are players of color.
2. Major League Baseball is an exception.
3. Most players in Major League Baseball are not players of color.
4. Every poll shows a result.
5. In each league, most head coaches are not people of color.
6. In basketball, the percentage of players of color is the highest.
7. Basketball includes men's basketball and women's basketball.
8. I wonder why there are many head coaches who are not people of color in the leagues.
9. I wonder whether head coaches who are not people of color are better at coaching.
10. I wonder whether the history of coaches causes this situation.
11. Major League Soccer exists.
12. In Major League Soccer, the percentage of head coaches of color is the highest.
13. I wonder why Major League Soccer has the highest percentage of head coaches of color.
14. I wonder why basketball has the highest percentage of players of color.
15. This situation impacts the sports community.
16. These statistics show a fact.
17. The percentage of people of color in higher positions is lower.
18. A coach is a higher position.
19. We need more representation of people of color in higher positions.
20. These jobs have power.
21. These jobs have control.
22. The graph compares percentages.
23. The graph compares the percentage of players of color in different sports leagues.
24. The graph compares the percentage of head coaches of color in different sports leagues.
25. The title is: We have diversity on the field, but what about behind the scenes on the sideline?
